attributes.action: go against the continual encouragement to increase numbers at university
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does the country really need more graduates? Or is this simply serving to devalue degrees? This is obviously an issue which needs to be addressed. Basically, the only impact I can see from pushing all students into higher education is to increase the number of qualifications needed for jobs. If everyone has a degree then it follows that employers will just set further qualifications to be attained.
